meanings.definition: A monetary unit of Thailand, equal to one hundredth of a baht.
meanings.sent1: In Thailand, you can buy candies with a satang.
meanings.sent2: I found a satang on the street while walking.
meanings.sent3: The satang rolled away, playing hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a satang.
meanings.sent5: The shiny satang sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A small coin of Thailand, equal to one hundredth of a baht.
meanings.sent1: My grandma gave me a satang for good luck.
meanings.sent2: The vendor handed me a satang as change.
meanings.sent3: The satang jumped out of my pocket and into the piggy bank.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a satang, small but valuable.
meanings.sent5: I collected satangs in a jar to save for a rainy day.
